description:
Picks up after episode 19 of Hayate no Gotoku! season 1. Season 2 is supposed to follow the manga more closely.
Hayate is still working as the Sanzenin Butler, and season 2 features a lot more Hinagiku, as scenarios that include herself and Hayate allude to potentially mutual feelings between them. Nagi is also interested in escalating her relationship with Hayate, since Nagi`s perception of her relationship with Hayate remains based on the miscommunication that occurred on their first meeting.

REGULAR.description:
Don`t you know? There is an unspeakable story about a rich person beyond imagination. You probably know, right? It was by chance that this boy who was in debt was working as a butler for the heiress. His name is Hayate Ayasaki. In order to repay his debt, he worked hard, day and night, to be a first-class butler for Yagi Sanzenin. Hayate and Nagi entered themselves to participate in one of the events of the freestyle marathon at Shiroko Academy. However, Nagi says that 50 meters is a long distance run and seems to be her maximum threshold. Is Hayate able to guide Yagi safely to the finish line?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 禁断のマラソン自由形!

REGULAR.description:
Hayate and Nagi didn’t end up winning the Freestyle Marathon. The master butler at the Sanzenin estate, Claus, was promised by Nagi that if they lost, Hayate would resign. However, the other maids requested that Hayate be given another chance since the master butler is responsible for his subordinates` shortcomings. Therefore, Claus gave Hayate another chance by taking a training course, “Tiger Butler’s Den”
Source: crunchyroll

Hayate is still in butler training and learns of the enormous mysterious labyrinth located in the basement of the Alex San Marco Church. The “Butler’s Medal” can be earned at one’s own risk if the “Butler Quest” is completed. In order to complete this task, he searches for four brave souls. 
-A self named elf, who boasts about her strength, an alcoholic teacher; Yukiji Katsura. 
-The one who was forced to join; Wataru Hayashi.
- One with infinite fortunes but lacking physical strength and social skills – the new sensational heroine; Nagi Sanzenin. 
-And finally, the one who has been filled with misfortune; Hayate Ayasaki. 
What?! Are these guys really going to be able to make it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: そして伝説にならない

REGULAR.description:
February 13th - Nagi is by herself secluded in the kitchen as she begins talking to herself while working quietly. "Wait, Hayate. Eat these chocolates that I made especially for you!!" Tomorrow is Valentine`s Day which is the one opportunity that young ladies have every year. Where will Nagi, Maria, Hinagiku, and Nishizawa-san be on Valentine`s Day?
Source: crunchyroll

Spring, where young men and women fall in love by the cherry blossoms. The typical boy, Kazuki Nishizawa and the typical girl, Nagi Sanzenin or so they say. One year later...Nagi is at home grappling with the cupboards. On top of the cupboard, there is a tin of the "World`s Best Cookies" that she tries to get but can`t reach. This concerns her, that she is unable to get things on her own.  Wataru heads to the video rental shop where he bumps into Kazuki. Where is his significant other?!
Source: crunchyroll

The last of the previous episode - Nagi is extremely embarrassed about what happened with Hayate that she can no longer look him in the eye. Maria gave him one million yen for three days worth of living expenses since he was asked to leave the residence. Yukiji, Himuro, and the Sister sniffed out the cash and Hayate got involved with them, paid for someone`s daughter`s medical bill, and so forth. All the money was gone! He was not only without money but also without a place to go. Who do you think shows up?
Source: crunchyroll

While Nagi`s heart was healing and Hayate gave her some space, of all places, why did he stay with Hinagiku? Is there something developing there? Maria was worried about Hayate`s whereabouts so she sneaked into Hakuo Academy in disguise. She took the elevator to the student council when she saw Hayate and it was just the two of them. Hayate wouldn`t expect to see Maria at the Academy so he didn`t recognize her. Therefore, she took this as a good opportunity to get things out of Hayate when the elevator suddenly stopped! The two of them are stuck in a confined space when they make a promise?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: やきもちとか焼かれたてジャぱん

REGULAR.description:
Many, many things happened to Hayate. When he finally left the Katsura household, he returned to the the Sanzenin`s. He went home with the kitten Hinagiku found and will ask Nagi if they can keep her. Hinagiku`s birthday is on March 3rd which is coming up and Hayate wants to get her a nice gift to show his appreciation of what she did. It seemed that Nagi Ojousama was deeply moved when she saw Hayate again but her eyes quickly fixed onto the kitten as it became Nagi`s pet. The tiger who is jealous of the cat and his hatred for it begins to flow out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シラヌイがやってきた

REGULAR.description:
Do you remember the intense battle that took place in the underground dungeon? She was burdened with an ill fate but fought back her tears for her intentions. Its been about three weeks after the battle, and Sonia is confused. She approached Wataru`s video rental shop and is deciding whether or not she should go in. Is sister part of the criminal group? Where is her love? In the second half, Yukiji sensei runs around look for her crush.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What A Maiden`s Heart Yearns For
乙女心が求めるものは......

REGULAR.description:
March 3rd is Hinagiku Katsura`s birthday, president of Hakuo Academy`s Student Council. Hayate wants to get her a present for letting him stay at her place. He`s a butler in debt so he can`t afford to buy her any expensive clothes. He wants to get her a sensible gift and asks other friends that are around the same age as Hinagiku to get some advice. He consults with Nishizawa-san who confessed her love for him before and they go out together to find a present. Is this a date?!
Source: crunchyroll

Hayate gave Hinagiku a beautiful bouquet of flowers for her birthday and she was about to receive a kiss from him only to discover that it was a dream. She`s been a bit concerned as her sweet sixteen is coming up. Every night, she thinks about Hayate which is frustrating her. In this episode, you will see Hermoine Ayasaki`s debut!!!
Source: crunchyroll

March 3 - The Hina Festival is taking place at Hakuo Academy. Being under the dollmaker`s spell, Hayate is disguised as a lovely maid. The curse must be lifted before the end of the Hina Festival and to do so, he must go to the highest point in the area which is the clock tower and the master of the tower happens to be Hakuo Academy`s student council president, Hinagiku. She`s the only one who can reverse the spell. However, the unlucky female butler receives a confession of love from a guy and is under house arrest. That`s where we left off last time. It`s Hermoine`s, no wait, Hayate`s fate? What?! What else happened on 3/3?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zankoku na Oobaka Yarou no Thesis
残酷な大馬鹿野郎のテーゼ

REGULAR.description:
March 3rd late evening - Hayate promised to give Hinagiku a birthday present to express his gratitude but the dollmaker turned him into a maid, he encountered another complication with a man confessing his love, and had to rescue Nagi. With all these things happening, he not only forgot about the present he wanted to give Hinagiku but also the duel they are supposed to have that will lift the curse if he wins. He races up to the clock tower to meet Hinagiku. Behind the bustling festival fell silence as the two faced each other.
Source: crunchyroll

The Saginomiya Clan are specialized demon exterminators. It is said that Isumi has the strongest power from successive generations but why did she lose it? According to Isumi`s mom, to regain lost power, it solidifies when one turns 16 but having a feminine appearance, being born unlucky as a butler, and being initially named "Ha" which is limited to a boy are necessary. Sure enough, is she already 16?? 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Family of the Saginomiya Household

REGULAR.description:
A meteorite fell on Izu peninsula which has affected the surrounding Shimoda onsen mysteriously. This is what is happening... First off, women`s endowment is being enhanced. Secondly, people are getting smarter and their math and science skills are improving. And finally lost powers are mysteriously returning. Thus, we don`t know the origin of these occurrences at the Shimoda onsen in Shizuoka prefecture...Something happens to Nagi, who doesn`t normally take trains when she travels!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 下田温泉湯けむり旅情

REGULAR.description:
Continuing on from the previous story, Hayate, Nagi, Maria, and a bunch of others head to Shimoda on the Izu peninsula to find the effects of the meteorite that fell. On the way, Nagi gets lost but raves about some Russian salt ramen and mindlessly suggests biking to Shimoda where Nishizawa-san picks her up. On the way to Shimoda, two masked hit man appear before them! Hayate comes to the rescue when a white masked spirit appears. Will they be able to make it to Shimoda safely?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スターダストメモリー

REGULAR.description:
When Nagi went into the onsen, she had a drunk-like behavior which was probably due to the affect of the onsen. Hayate went to save her but despite the fact she was naked, Hayate had a very calm demeanor which upset Nagi. She met an alien and from a far distant, something came towards them. Nagi was helping the alien find Maya, the spaceship when something happened…On other matters, Hinagiku and Nishizawa-san were developing a deeper relationship at the onsen. We’ll fully understand the real reason why Nagi went to Shimoda which will conclude this Izu-Shimoda episode!
Source: crunchyroll

March 14, White Day - According to the internet and encyclopedia, it`s a day when guys who have received chocolates on Valentine`s Day must return candies or white chocolate to those whom he received chocolates from a month ago. On the way to Shimoda in Izu, Nishizawa-san already told Hayate that he doesn`t need to get her anything but of course, on the day of, she was hoping to receive something from him. As for Hayate, he was still going to get Nishizawa-san something but didn`t know what to get when he consulted some of the gals...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: People Who Never Learn on White Day
ホワイトデーの懲りない人々

REGULAR.description:
We are entering spring vacation where Nagi spends her days playing video games, reading manga, and watching anime until she falls asleep. Video games, manga, anime and sleep. Her routine was broken when Hayate needed to get a new cell phone. They went to a shop in Shinjuku and for the mere moment that Hayate purchases a cell phone, Nagi wanders around and gets lost. She ends up in the "Lost Children" center where a duel between two lost children is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll

We don’t know where Lin Regiostar resides who is the ghost of the Catholic priest. Since his first appearance, nothing has really happened with him. It`s finally time for him to rest in peace. However, the reason he wants to rest in peace is to remain in this world to clear up his strong regret. That regret is not making out with a maid. Is he drawing closer to the hand of the devil? Can Hayate protect Maria? Isumi is dressed as a maid and Maria, Saki are already maids. When the third maid appears, all sorts of conversations begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Couldn`t Do the Maid Turn
メイドターンができなくて

REGULAR.description:
There was breaking news that a four meter anaconda that was being raised by someone got loose and ran away which created a lot of commotion. Nagi and Maria couldn’t believe that someone would have such a big and dangerous animal as a pet. The Sanzenins also have a pet that could be categorized as “big and dangerous”; Tama, the white tiger who always hungers for ALL of Nagi’s affection to himself. He wanted to get rid of one of his competition, Shiranui, the pet cat so he began to chase her down. At that moment, there was a delivery truck at their house and Tama chases Shiranui into the truck when the door shut! They are about to go to an unknown place. Tama’s survival instincts begin…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nandakanda de Jibin`chi no Neko ga Ichiban Kawaii
Somehow Our Own Cat is the Very Cutest
なんだかんだで自分ちの猫が一番かわいい

REGULAR.description:
Is she the typical wealthy, capricious type? For Hayate’s birthday, Nagi declares to get a part time job to save up money to buy him a watch. All those present were surprised to hear this but Hinagiku currently works part-time at the coffee shop, “Donguri". The manager of “Donguri” calls Hayate and mentions that they are currently looking for someone to take Hinagiku’s place. Hayate already has a job as a butler so he’s a bit hesitant but Maria, thinking on her toes, encourages this so he can work at “Donguri” with Nagi. Nishizawa-san also works there. This is Nagi’s first part-time job, how will she handle it?
Source: crunchyroll

April 3rd is Sakuya’s birthday. One of the gals is a bit worried regarding this day of celebration. Her name is Chiharu Harukaze. She is the secretary of Hakuo Academy and the manager of the Maid Café “Himawari”. Izumi and her friends invite her to go to karaoke which she turns down because she said she doesn’t like noisy places. Actually, the real reason is that she works at a maid café where she is always welcoming the customers energetically even though that is not her true personality. She heard that Hayate and Nagi will be at Sakuya’s party which worries her. Will she be able to protect her secret of being a maid?
Source: crunchyroll

Hinagiku and Nishizawa-san unexpectedly meet at the coffee shop “Donguri”. Hinagiku wants to talk to Nishizawa-san about Hayate so she invites her to enjoy the cherry blossoms with her one evening. But, Nishizawa-san invites her to go on the ferris wheel which is a symbol of Ginnan district. But, if you guys remember, Hinagiku is afraid of heights. Will she be about to express her thoughts in this situation? Sakuya’s birthday party is also happening at this time at Aizawa’s house. Nagi was so exhausted she lies down on her bed but no one is aware of her whereabouts so they get worried. Is she okay?
Source: crunchyroll

After working at a part-time job for the first time and attending Sakuya’s birthday party, Nagi’s health took a slight toll so she’s resting in bed. Maria, Claus, Tama, & Shiranui are all out which leaves Hayate and Nagi alone in Nagi’s estate. The second half is also climactic. The original development returns; the development of the forbidden love…will it happen?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Because it`s a Story About a Rich Girl and Her Butler
Ojousama to Shitsuji no Ohanashi desu kara
お嬢様と執事のお話ですから
Music Video: Karakoi: Dakara Shoujo wa Koi o Suru
Shiraishi Ryouko to Elias ga Yasai Izakaya "Genki" de Shinboku o Fukameru no Maki
白石涼子とELISAが野菜居酒屋『玄気』で親睦を深める の巻
Itou Shizuka ga Shumi de Aru Tsuri no Udemae o Hirou Suru no Maki

Tanaka Rie ga Akiba no Maid Cafe de Maid-damashii o Manabu no Maki
田中理恵がアキバのメイドカフェでメイド魂を学ぶ の巻
免許を取得したばかりの白石涼子が日○・キュ○ブを試乗する の巻
Itou Shizuka ga Hinagiku ni Chikazuku Tame ni Kendou o Manabu no Maki
伊藤静がヒナギクに近付くために剣道を学ぶ の巻
Nekozuki no Tanaka Rie ga Neko Cafe de Nyannyan Suru no Maki
ネコ好きの田中理恵が猫カフェでニャンニャンする の巻
Shiraishi Ryouko ga Shougakkou Irai 15 Nenburi ni Althorn o Fuku no Maki
白石涼子が小学校以来15年ぶりにアルトホルンを吹く の巻
Itou Shizuka ga Kenkou Shindan o Ukete Jibun no Kenkou Joutai o Kakunin Suru no Maki
伊藤静が健康診断を受けて自分の健康状態を確認する の巻
Tanaka Rie ga Tokui Ryouri no Udemae o Hirou Suru no Maki
田中理恵が得意料理の腕前を披露する の巻
